ComicInfo.Summary: Single Bullet Theory: With another impossible murder committed by the Pez killer, Sara scrambles to find clues as to the mystery murderer's identity. As she lies in bed trying to control the Witchblade, she awakens to discover that the Pez killer has been in her very bedroom.
ComicInfo.Title: Single Bullet Theory
